mapper.update:
update biz_union_verify
fk_shp_shop_id = #{fkShpShopId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fk_pro_classify_code = #{fkProClassifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
license_img_url = #{licenseImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_img_url = #{validImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stock_img_url = #{stockImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
empower_img_url = #{empowerImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_user_img_url = #{otherUserImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_user_type = #{shopUserType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
insert_time = #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
insert_admin = #{insertAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_admin = #{updateAdmin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del = #{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fail_remark = #{failRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, fk_shp_shop_id, fk_pro_classify_code, license_img_url, valid_img_url, stock_img_url, empower_img_url, other_user_img_url, state, shop_user_type, insert_time, update_time, insert_admin, update_admin, del, remark, fail_remark from biz_union_verify where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT buv.id AS id, buv.fk_shp_shop_id AS shopId, ss.NAME AS NAME, ss.contact AS contact, ss.number AS number, sd.province AS province, sd.city AS city, buv.fk_pro_classify_code AS classifyCode, buv.license_img_url AS licenseImgUrl, buv.shop_user_type AS shopUserType, buv.valid_img_url AS validImgUrl, buv.stock_img_url AS stockImgUrl, buv.empower_img_url AS empowerImgUrl, ss.insert_time AS insertTime, buv.insert_time AS examineTime, buv.state AS state, buv.remark AS remark, buv.other_user_img_url AS otherUserImgUrl, buv.fail_remark AS failRemark FROM biz_union_verify buv LEFT JOIN shp_shop ss ON buv.fk_shp_shop_id = ss.id LEFT JOIN shp_detail sd ON ss.id = sd.fk_shp_shop_id WHERE buv.del = '0'
and ss.name like CONCAT('%',#{shopName},'%')
and ss.number like CONCAT('%',#{number},'%')
and ss.contact like CONCAT('%',#{contact},'%')
and buv.fk_pro_classify_code = #{fkProClassifyCode}
and buv.state = #{state}
order by buv.insert_time desc

select id, fk_shp_shop_id, fk_pro_classify_code, license_img_url, valid_img_url, stock_img_url, empower_img_url, state, shop_user_type, insert_time, update_time, insert_admin, update_admin, del, remark, fail_remark from biz_union_verify where fk_shp_shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by insert_time desc limit 1
